title: Alien parasites infiltrating Earth! The Brain Eaters (1958) Colorized | Sci-Fi Movie | Subtitles

sources.title: Alien parasites infiltrating Earth! The Brain Eaters (1958) Colorized | Sci-Fi Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
A peaceful small town's residents begin to act strangely after a mysterious meteor crash-lands nearby. As it's discovered that parasitic aliens are taking over human bodies by attaching to their brains, a group of determined locals must find a way to stop the mind-controlling invasion before it consumes their entire community.

Original title: The Brain Eaters (1958)

Black & White version:  https://youtu.be/6Sa8o_j4VZg

Director: Bruno VeSota
Writer: Gordon Urquhart
Stars: Ed Nelson, Alan Jay Factor, Cornelius Keefe & Leonard Nimoy
Genres: Cult Classic, Sci-Fi, Horror
Budget: $30,000 

00:00 Full Movie
00:20  A living nightmare begins in Riverdale, Illinois when a cone-shaped object is discovered and several citizens are brutally slain.
10:10  A group of scientists and government officials are investigating an indestructible spaceship and its purpose.
18:52  A group of people discuss the mysterious death of the Mayor and discover that the parasite on his neck was causing his illness and eventual death.
26:50  A group of individuals discuss the threat of parasites and plan a search for the other part of a ship.
35:03  A dying man from a scientific expedition who vanished five years ago reveals that the parasites come from the earth and have survived underground for millions of years.
46:27  A group of extraterrestrial beings plan to organize humans to aid them in bringing more of their kind to the surface.
56:46  A plan is devised to use a heavy electrical cable to feed current into a high tension tower, potentially causing a dangerous explosion.
